Chinese: 呢齣/呢套電影係真人真事改編嘅。
Jyutping: ne1 ceot1 / ne1 tou3 din6jing2 hai6 zan1jan4zan1si6 goi2pin1 ge3 。
Yale: nē chēut / nē tou dihnyíng haih jānyàhnjānsih gói'pīn ge 。
English: This film is a story of real people and real events; this film is based on a true story.

Jyutping: keoi5zyut6 zo2 go3 hap6zok3 gei1wui6 fu1
Yale: kéuihjyuht jó go hahpjok gēiwuih fū
English: refused a good chance of cooperation
